description: Write scenarios in plain English. NO variables, NO placeholders, NO Scenario Outlines, NO Examples tables at initial scenario writing stage. Example: 'Given user has typed request message start shaping' not 'Given user has typed <request_message>'.

do.description: Plain English scenarios without variables. Example: 'Given user has attached documents' not 'Given user has attached <documents>'

example: Given user has typed request message 'start shaping'
Then AI Chat identifies story shaping keywords
Given user has attached documents to chat window
And user has typed request message 'start shaping'

dont.description: Don't use variables or placeholders initially. Example: '<request_message>' variable (wrong at this stage), Scenario Outline (wrong at this stage)

example: Given user has typed request message '<request_message>' (WRONG - has variable)

guidance.description: Don't use Scenario Outline at initial stage
example: Scenario Outline: AI Chat detects keywords (WRONG - Outline at this stage)
